title: BRIEF-UMC's Xiamen subsidiary acquires machinery, equipment from KLA-Tencor Corp
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
* Says Xiamen subsidiary acquires machinery and equipment from KLA-Tencor Corp for T$1.59 billion ($48.25 million)...
